meanings.definition: The action or process of making a copy of something.
meanings.sent1: The reproduction of this document will ensure everyone has a copy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the reproduction of cells in a simple way.
meanings.sent3: I tried to use the reproduction machine, but it made a funny noise.
meanings.sent4: The reproduction of ideas can lead to great innovation.
meanings.sent5: The artist's reproduction of the painting was so accurate, it looked real.

meanings.definition: The production of offspring by a sexual or asexual process.
meanings.sent1: The reproduction of rabbits happens quickly in the wild.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the reproduction of animals to understand genetics.
meanings.sent3: The reproduction of plants can be quite fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: The reproduction of bacteria in the lab was a key part of the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The reproduction of fish in the pond created a lively ecosystem.
